text: Joaquín Pardo (28 February 1946 - 16 October 2020) was a Colombian footballer. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1968 Summer Olympics. He played for the national team. Pardo died on 16 October 2020 at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for Colombia Category:Colombian footballers
title: Joaquín Pardo
